column5: Went out today and had a good day on the boat. We had Mr. Earl as the first mate and our two guest fisherman was Aymen and Kevin.    Kevin with a nice 22 lb Blue Cat   Aymen with a nice 11 lb Blue Cat   Earl bringing up the rear with a 8 lb gar   Earl holding my 12 lber I was busy snelling more hooks.    A nice bass from last weekend from my super secret farm pond.  Art
Looks like a great day on the water Art Cats, Gar and B A Double S, big ole Bass. Part of the 5 basic food groups ! Thanks for sharing.
Awesome Art    Sounds like you guys had a great time out there   Beauty cats
Great report Arthur! I really like those blues compared to the flat heads. Is this the year's maiden trip for the big boat? The bass doesn't look too shabby either eh? Thanks for the pics!

The boat made it thru the winter with no damage after dewinterizing  I turned the keys and it fired right up. I did a shake down run last week before loading people on board just in case there was an issue. The bite was good the hard part was holding the boat right with the current being tidal and a strong cross wind the drift sock was the only reason we could put any lines out.  Thanks all  Art
Well it looks like it's been a good day all round for you today.
Looks to me like everyone had a great day!
